entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 18 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. High 14 except 18 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
